storyInfo: Venezia Senior pays a hefty price to protect Venezia Trucking. Lyudmila bids farewell to Eirene, after warning her against her hidden thoughts. The Signori dei Lupi game ends, but humanity's power struggles persist as always. Lappland becomes the new alpha.

attributes.content: Grandma...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I don't understand...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: You're not getting away this time, bloody pup.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: As the Carnevale drew to a close and the dust settled in the square last night, Lyudmila spotted a familiar red silhouette.
She followed the figure through winding alleys—sometimes hitting dead ends, other times standing still. It clearly had no direction.
Lyudmila readied for an ambush, biding her time. Her strike landed true.
She pinned the figure down, pressing her blade against its heart. Just a little more, and she would avenge her mentor and end this haunting ghost.
But the red Lupo offered no resistance. She simply knelt, muttering as she stared into space.
Lyudmila looked into her eyes and saw nothing but emptiness. The silence was brief, and the red lupo spoke—
...True wolf.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Grandma was the true wolf...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I was like them, chosen by the true wolf...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: We hunt for the true wolf, die for the true wolf, deliver the true wolf's victory...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: The story was a lie... Grandma was a lie...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: It's all a lie...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: You're talking about your game?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: So teacher had to live in fear all her life with a limp leg, just because she's part of this stupid game?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: You killed her for this 'victory'?!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I don't understand—
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Lyudmila suddenly feels a force from her counterpart, and hears the sound of blade ripping through fabric.
She takes a step back.
Is this what your Kal'tsit taught you?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Violence, hatred, ideals, fate... your Kal'tsit always has an explanation, doesn't she?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Kal'tsit... Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: The kneeling, red-garbed Lupo searches through her clothes in the rain, eventually pulling out a tooth from where Lyudmila's knife had struck.
It's a small, sharp tooth. The knife has left a clear mark on it.
A baby tooth?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Grandma told me that this kind of tooth falls out because it can't tear the prey's flesh.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: But I have always kept it... not sure why.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Kal'tsit said I should keep it safe, until I know the answer...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I didn't listen to Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I found the girl with the bow.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: She's alive. You missed her vital organs.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Did you doubt yourself in the final moments, scum?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Do you want to see this Kal'tsit of yours?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: (Waggles ears silently)
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Well, I'm going to find her and ask her what all this is about.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Don't you dare die before then.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: And don't you dare get my knife dirty.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Is this how Nuova Volsinii's law enforcement does things?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: As we have already explained to you multiple times, Signor Saluzzo...
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Your request for legal counsel is perfectly lawful and reasonable. We duly notified Saluzzo Vino, but nobody has come... It's not because of any interference on our part.
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: I want to see your supervisor. No, I want Justice Lavinia, or Mayor Leontuzzo.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Umm...
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Uh?
attributes.name: Police Officer

attributes.content: Buongiorno, Signore. Had a bad night?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lappland?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You have been banished from the Saluzzos forever, traitor. You do not have the right to rescue me.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Oh please, old thing, still so full of yourself.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Do I look like I'm here to rescue you?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Catch.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lappland throws an elaborate gift box through the cell door window.
Alberto does not catch it. The gift box falls to the ground, its lid coming off and revealing a new suit—briskly cut, elaborately embellished, even more so than Lappland's outfit.
How do you like it? Meant it to be a gift for the Carnevale. The work of a master Siracusan tailor.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: We already said goodbye last year, dear father, so I wasn't planning to see you again. I preferred to spend my time on more meaningful things.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But then, it would be ungrateful of me to not present a parting gift, after all the lessons you taught me...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But the little tailor who was supposed to run errands got into a little problem, so I had to make this trip myself.
attributes.name: Lappland
Lappland
attributes.content: Unfortunately, the Carnevale has already come to a close...

attributes.name: Lappland
attributes.content: But from the looks of things, you need something to wear for prison, don't you? Haha.
attributes.joined: Unfortunately, the Carnevale has already come to a close...But from the looks of things, you need something to wear for prison, don't you? Haha.

attributes.content: Are you trying to provoke me?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: It won't work, Lappland.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: How can you be so clever yet so childish? Every Saluzzo knows that Alberto Saluzzo is never wrong—
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Tsk-tsk.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Well, since I'm here, let me tell you one other thing...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Let's just say... your stay will be much longer than you think.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: The vote has been taken, Signorina Lappland.
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: Despite your mistakes, you are the don's only daughter, and the heir to Famiglia Saluzzo.
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: We need you to take charge of the famiglia's affairs for now. The most urgent tasks are responding to City Hall's investigation of Saluzzo Vino after the Carnevale and getting the don out.
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: What? I was just here for a drink.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I thought there are no famiglie in Nuova Volsinii. Are you sure you want to play this inheritance game?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Besides, didn't the old man pick his guy before he went in?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Do you mean...
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: If you're looking for help, you should look for it from Saluzzo Vino's primary partner.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I am honored to take on this responsibility, Signorina Lappland... and my friends from Saluzzo.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: So, what's the plan?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: We will immediately audit all our businesses in the city, in accordance with the New Urban Management Act.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: In addition to illegal registration, if Signor Saluzzo has indeed been manipulating Saluzzo Vino to engage in prohibited activities, it is our duty to gather materials and self-report to City Hall.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: If necessary, I will restructure the leadership of Saluzzo Vino.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: A necessary sacrifice, to protect Saluzzo Vino.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Oh my, that sounds like so much hard work. Here's a toast to you.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: How dare Bellone... did he plan this from the beginning?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You would allow the Bellones to take the Saluzzos' business in Nuova Volsinii—
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Remember what you said? 'Banished from the Saluzzos forever,' right?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Or did you think I was going to come home to roost, like a migratory fowlbeast?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: There was always a question on my mind, PAPA.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Why were you so angry when I tried to kill the Bocche al Lupo at Brunello, or when I let Texas go in Columbia?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Were you angry that I acted against the famiglia's interests, violated the rules of Siracusa...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Or were you just angry that I was telling everyone that there are certain things which are outside Alberto Saluzzo's control?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You should probably save your strength for the trial. I doubt the new management of Saluzzo Vino would make his legal counsel available for you.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: My dear father, you're not just a fool, you're a boring fool.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It's really addio this time. But cheer up!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You'll be better-dressed than all your fellow inmates, after all...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Hey, ain't you done yet?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I don't know what the paper pushers at City Hall are thinkin'. Same points, same social service, but why I gotta sweep two more streets than you, Capone?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: That's SIGNOR Capone to you, Gambino. Don't forget who saved you when you passed out in the alley that night.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Vaffanculo.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Did you hear? Half of Venezia Trucking's management are in police custody right now.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: It wasn't just cigar and vinyl sent to Venezia Senior's room that night. There were also detailed business and personnel records of Venezia Trucking for the past year.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Anyone who was closely associated with Venezia Junior got rooted out, and the City Hall cazzi came into work the next day to a thick pile of self-reports lying on their table.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Venezia Senior cut ties so swiftly and decisively that City Hall couldn't find fault. Venezia Trucking will get a full makeover but won't be shut down. Venezia Junior's impact was reduced to a minimum.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: The famiglie sure are finding new and... clever ways of dealing with traitors in Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: The don really struck like thunder, didn't he? I thought he came for the festival.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: We'd've been rotting behind bars by now, if we'd listened to you and stayed there.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: What's the difference?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: We lost all our citizen points, and we gotta start again from scratch... once again, we got nothing left.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Well, not exactly nothing...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Capone casts his gaze at the intersection, where a familiar yellow cab is parked.
Lappland said we can have the cab... our reward, basically.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: How long do you think it'll take before we get a taxi company started in this city? I know what we'll call it. Taxi Siciliano. Whaddya think?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: ...I think we should get outta here, because that judge is coming.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Wait, I don't think she's coming for us—
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You're just going to leave without saying anything?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I won't stay any longer. Don't want to keep you up at night.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Where will you go?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Rhodes Island, maybe? Haven't seen Lisa in a while.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Now that this old score has been settled, I have the time, and the mood.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I'm not here for small talk, Signora Venezia. We're not that close to begin with.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Earlier in the morning, Venezia Senior came to see me and Leontuzzo...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Whatever is going on with Venezia is none of my business—
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: He would pay any price for Venezia Trucking's survival, even if it's just one factory but he also had another request—to grant you safe passage out of Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Given the actions of Venezia Junior on the night of the Carnevale, your efforts helped City Hall contain the violence to some extent. Therefore, leniency should be considered.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: However, the charges of assault and battery still stand, not to mention that your actions were acts of revenge within a famiglia.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: We will issue an arrest warrant for you, Signora Venezia.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Arrest warrant?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I have multiple mafioso bounties on me, and even Signora Sicilia's prohibition... the arrest warrant will be a nice souvenir, I guess.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Do not dismiss it so casually, Signora Venezia.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: This arrest warrant is empowered by the New Urban Management Act. Unlike Signora Sicilia's prohibition, there is no room for mediation just because some famiglia comes into power or loses it.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The law is the law, Signora Venezia. We've talked about this before.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Your every move will be watched by Nuova Volsinii, and perhaps all of Siracusa in the future. The arrest warrant will remain valid until you are brought into custody.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I appreciate the reminder, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I'm not dismissing your declaration. I could tell that you're a firm person when I saw you at the winery.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: In the Siracusa I knew, you didn't need a reason to kill. But that's not how things should be. Every action needs a reason—a proper reason.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: It's true for judges, for mothers... even for killers.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I approve of your reason, which is why I approve of your action. Besides, as I've told you, I don't have anything against your profession.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I'm just thinking... if you issued a warrant for me...
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Should I look forward to when we meet again?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Well, I should go.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: ...Hello, Eirene.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Are you feeling better, Signor Bellone?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Yes. Thanks for asking.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: There is something I need to give you.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: ...A resignation letter?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I-I would like to resign as president of the Truckers' Union.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: One year ago, I promised you and Judge Lavinia that no mafioso would infiltrate the Truckers' Union... but I failed to keep the promise.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I stopped them from putting their people in the union, but it didn't prevent them from achieving their goal at all.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Sommer, and all the others whom they used... it's my fault. And I tried to coerce Judge Lavinia when things were exposed.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: It's not your fault. Not all of it, at least.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: No one can stay calm when they see their best friend die and their family, along with themselves, backed into a corner.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: In the end, little harm was done.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But I just can't forgive myself...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I received a joint letter just before you arrived.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: It was signed by two hundred full-time drivers of the Truckers' Union, plus several hundred more temporary and contract staff, asking for amnesty towards your actions during the Carnevale.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Th-They shouldn't have...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Rethink your resignation, Eirene.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: City Hall will hold an internal hearing next week to discuss integrating the Truckers' Union as a government department alongside City Development and the police.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Together, we will build Nuova Volsinii's logistics and the city itself, Eirene. I look forward to a long and productive partnership with you.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I still trust the decision that Lavinia and I made that day. You may or may not be the best person to lead the Truckers' Union, but you're a decent person.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: In the two days since I woke up, I've learned about what I missed, and thought about many things.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Finding the direction is easy. It's the journey that's hard—a long, long journey.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: How did it go?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: The association will need to cooperate with the investigation and face penalties. However, City Hall won't pursue what happened during the Carnevale or those who helped with the smuggling.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I thought I asked you to wait for me at the camp.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I came to say goodbye. Didn't want to deal with the commotion if I said it at the camp.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Y-You're leaving?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I found the red one. She's not in great shape...
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I thought she was your sworn enemy.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Yes. She needs to go back to somebody, and that somebody is my other sworn enemy, whom I'll have to visit sooner or later...
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: It's a long story. Anyway, if nothing much is going on with the Union for the time being, I want to visit this place called Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: There's something I want to ask before I leave.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: That night, when you ordered us to point our weapons at the Venezia mafiosi... what were you thinking?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: That all of the Union's problems will go away if we kill those bastards?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: And who smuggled what will remain a secret forever?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Were you confident that it could be done, with so many people behind you, and so many weapons in our hands?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Were you confident that you wouldn't be held responsible?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Were you thinking about protecting the people behind you, or how, like the bastards on the other side, you held the fates of so many in your hands?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Was it the gunshot that made you stop... or was it your judgment from deeper down?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: No need to tell me, Eirene. You know the answer.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I told you the story of Talulah, a respected leader who became an evil dragon. I failed to see it happen, and I didn't kill her.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I won't make the same mistake again. I'm watching you, Eirene. I'm the sword that hangs above your head.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: If that's what you become, I will come for you, no matter where I am... and I will kill you.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I hope that day never comes. I hope we can truly, sincerely, give each other our blessings... friend.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Eirene is alone. The Reproba with the furrowed brows has vanished without a trace.
The night wind of late autumn is chilly, but Eirene just stands there, lost in thought.
It's me, Sandro.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: About the joint letter... thank you.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I thought you promised Texas to take us away from Siracusa.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Haha, I lied.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Besides, did she really win the bet?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Is the Carnevale over, Zaaro? Or has it just begun?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The old wolf of Venezia has hidden his fangs and claws, blending back into the pack. The pup named Eirene has learned the tricks of hunting on her own...
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: That's why I said you guys are stupid.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You set all sorts of dumb rules, but you can't resist breaking them.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The game becomes increasingly boring with each cycle. The all-powerful Signori dei Lupi are reduced to petty worries, like humans.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: From one wolf to another, tell me, Zaaro, what set the revelry beneath us into motion.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Power, obviously.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Yes. A port, a community, a city... wherever there are people, there is power.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Whether one pursues it, detests it, seeks to control it, or grasps it like a drowning man clutching at straws...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: They all end up holding power tight and wielding it with fervor.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Power is the true wolfpack. It's the game all Siracusans… no, all HUMANITY was born playing.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: There is no judge, no rules... its variety is infinite, and it does not end except by death.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Like the wind on the wilderness, there is no direction, and no one knows where it comes from... but it never stops.
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: Interesting. Very interesting indeed.
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: I'll concede that you have discovered this pleasure earlier than us. Do you intend to put an end to the Fangs, and have Lappland lead us into this new game?
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: That depends on what Vargo, Agnese, and the ones over there who haven't spoken think.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: No human has ever been the alpha of the pack in the memory of the Signori dei Lupi... nay, of the Beast Aristocrats.
attributes.name: Agnese

attributes.content: Do you have a hierarchy over here?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That's a human concept to shackle their own brethren. You call yourselves the Signori dei Lupi; act like one.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: If she truly does bring us pleasure...
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: ...There's one more thing you forgot.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: Look at the crystals on her leg. She's pretty far gone, and Oripathy is an uncurable disease for humans. Will we, deathless Signori dei Lupi, recognize a dying human as alpha?
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: True, I probably don't have much time left.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Doesn't that add to the thrill of the game?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I have a feeling.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: That this is going to be the best time of my life.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Oh, and Emperor came to talk to me.
attributes.name: Agnese

attributes.content: It's not just the pack that has sensed this unease... it is a crisis that has put all the Aristocrats of Beasts on guard.
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: Emperor and our cousins in other races wish to talk to us.
attributes.name: Agnese

attributes.content: If Lappland is our alpha, then...
attributes.name: Agnese

attributes.content: There is no rest for the wicked, is there?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Tell them...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The wilderness keeps its promises.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Wait for me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Please take a look, Signorina Texas. I'll submit it if there's no issue.
attributes.name: City Hall Staff

attributes.content: There's so much paperwork to become an independent consultant for you guys?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Mi scusi.
attributes.name: City Hall Staff

attributes.content: The Carnevale drew a large number of tourists and delivered on the promotional expectations. Nuova Volsinii Port has received a large number of orders in recent days...
attributes.name: City Hall Staff

attributes.content: Moving forward, our logistics systems will reach beyond Nuova Volsinii, connecting with other cities in Siracusa, and even abroad. There is no room for negligence.
attributes.name: City Hall Staff

attributes.content: Penguin Logistics has the qualities we're looking for, but Lungmen is a long way from here. The process for bringing you on as a special consultant will be a little more complicated.
attributes.name: City Hall Staff

attributes.content: Just sign here!
attributes.name: City Hall Staff

attributes.content: Welcome to Nuova Volsinii, Signorina Texas. Things are about to get busy.
attributes.name: City Hall Staff

attributes.content: Excuse me, could you submit my application with Cellinia's?
We meet again, Cellinia.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Giovanna?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I thought you wouldn't be coming back for a while after you left for Columbia.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Has your journey for inspiration come to a close?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Sora started her second Siracusa tour two months ago, didn't she?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Did you notice the name 'Caterina Culture Ltd.' on the sponsor list?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Since when have you become so close with Sora?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: She's a friend, too. One whom you introduced me to.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: My injuries have healed, and I've found new inspiration. It was time to come back.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: The happy times of the past may be gone, but that doesn't mean we can't create even happier stories ourselves. I needed time to prepare before...
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Now, I'm ready.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: And none too soon, I see. It seems like you have made a decision, too.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Yes. Things will be different between us now.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm looking forward to it, Cellinia.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Zzz...
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Father? Father Agenir?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Oh, it's you.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: I wouldn't have realized that you were in Nuova Volsinii, if I didn't see your photo in the submissions for memories of the Carnevale.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Well, I didn't tell you. Or anyone else, for that matter.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Are you planning to leave now?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'll go back to Montelupe with you. There are certain things that I should explain to Signora Sicilia personally.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: This city is just entering its second year. Its mayor has many things to attend to.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Take it easy, young man.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: I'm loath to admit that we're like concerned parents who quietly follow their children the first time they go out on their own...
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But yes, I came to this city at Sicilia's behest.. to see it, deal with some people or declare a decree on her behalf, if it comes to that.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: But I did nothing. The Carnevale had its little hiccups, but it's come to a satisfactory conclusion, hasn't it?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: In certain ways, it's true that you haven't completely fulfilled your promise to Sicilia, to transform Nuova Volsinii into a new city that's totally different...
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: I can't deny it.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Well, Sicilia had so much more on her plate when she first came back to Siracusa. It wasn't easy, bringing guns and order to this country.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Of course, you're facing more resistance than she did. That's why she wouldn't pour cold water on the fire of youth... she hasn't gotten that old.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: I'm not coming back with you to Montelupe to prostrate myself before Signora Sicilia and beg for her mercy.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I have some plans about the future of Nuova Volsinii, about promoting the New Urban Management Act...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Ah. Very good, then.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: I want to ask, though... if you came to deal with problems, why didn't you do anything?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I saw an old friend.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: How long has it been, Umberto?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: ...Father Agenir?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I remembered that you moved to Nuova Volsinii. Just thought I would drop by.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Are you waiting for someone?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Mafia killers? Or the Fangs?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: I don't know. But death will find me, one way or another.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I'm old enough.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Sorry, it's been a long time since I walked into a church, or offered a prayer for the dying.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Some priest you are... I still remember the day we met.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: It never occurred to me in a thousand years that I would be hired to kill a Sankta, a priest no less. A moment of surprise was enough for you to pull a gun from your robes...
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I would never have gone back to being a tailor, if not for you.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: All in the past.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: Why have you chosen to come to Nuova Volsinii tonight? Is the Carnevale—
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Any final wishes, Umberto? I'll see what I can do.
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: No, Father.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: None at all?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: I remember you have a grandson... Luchino, is it?
attributes.name: Agenir

attributes.content: There's only so much I can do for him.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: To me, he's my only family. To him, there will be a day when I'm not his only family anymore...
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: The future awaits the young.
attributes.name: Umberto
